actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Meat Inspection Act, as amended, to require frankfurters and similar cooked sausages to contain a protein level of not less than 12 percent.

summary.text: Nutritious Hot Dog Act - Requires, under the Federal Meat Inspection Act, that frankfurters, hot dogs, bologna, knockwurst and other similar cooked sausage have a protein level of not less than twelve percent. (Amends 21 U.S.C. 602)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Meat Inspection Act, as amended, to require frankfurters and similar cooked sausages to contain a protein level of not less than 12 percent.
